programme.title: Father Brown

programme.desc: With the town still reeling from 'Radio-gate,' Maggie is desperate to make amends. Meanwhile, Neil and Kelly decide to embrace what was broadcast about them and go along with the unsubstantiated gossip as a way to explain their sudden windfall.
